rules_text:
Foreshadow 5–{R}  [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with five time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
When Firetop Ravagers enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
